tadpole.name: Bufo Tadpole
tadpole.description: Tiny bufo tadpoles that produce 0.1 bufos per second
tadpole.detailedDescription: The humble beginning of your bufo empire. These wiggly youngsters are just starting their journey to bufohood.

froglet.name: Bufo Froglet
froglet.description: Adolescent bufos that produce 1 bufo per second
froglet.detailedDescription: In-betweeners with legs but still sporting tails. These teenage bufos are eager to prove their worth and contribute to the cause.

bufo.name: Bufo
bufo.description: Common bufos that produce 8 bufos per second
bufo.detailedDescription: Fully matured bufos with impeccable jumping skills. These reliable amphibians form the backbone of your bufo production empire.

giant_bufo.name: Giant Bufo
giant_bufo.description: Massive bufos that produce 47 bufos per second
giant_bufo.detailedDescription: These enormous amphibians have appetites to match their impressive size. Their deep croaks can be heard across the entire pond network.

chromatic_bufo.name: Chromatic Bufo
chromatic_bufo.description: Vibrantly colored bufos that produce 260 bufos per second
chromatic_bufo.detailedDescription: Their dazzling array of colors serves as nature's warning sign. These specialized bufos have mastered the art of rapid bufo synthesis.

canopy_bufo.name: Canopy Bufo
canopy_bufo.description: Arboreal bufos that produce 1,400 bufos per second
canopy_bufo.detailedDescription: Masters of vertical habitats, these bufos have evolved powerful adhesive toe pads. Their treetop perspective gives them unique insights into bufo production.

prosperity_bufo.name: Prosperity Bufo
prosperity_bufo.description: Robust bufos that produce 7,800 bufos per second
prosperity_bufo.detailedDescription: These well-rounded bufos have developed specialized chambers for maximum bufo production. Their optimistic croaks are said to bring good fortune.

golden_bufo.name: Golden Bufo
golden_bufo.description: Mythical bufos that produce 44,000 bufos per second
golden_bufo.detailedDescription: These rare specimens shimmer with a metallic luster that defies explanation. Ancient texts speak of their ability to transform resources into prosperity.

cosmic_bufo.name: Cosmic Bufo
cosmic_bufo.description: Interdimensional bufos that produce 260,000 bufos per second
cosmic_bufo.detailedDescription: These mysterious amphibians appear to phase in and out of our reality. Their bodies shimmer with what appears to be a reflection of distant stars and nebulae.

ancient_bufo.name: Ancient Bufo
ancient_bufo.description: Primordial bufos that produce 1,600,000 bufos per second
ancient_bufo.detailedDescription: These timeless beings have witnessed the rise and fall of countless empires. Their wisdom manifests as an unparalleled capacity for bufo generation.

quantum_bufo.name: Quantum Bufo
quantum_bufo.description: Reality-bending bufos that produce 10,000,000 bufos per second
quantum_bufo.detailedDescription: Existing simultaneously in multiple realities, these bufos harvest energy from parallel dimensions. Their very existence challenges our understanding of physics.
